name: Gebrechen
description:
Joe is an old and experienced hero who after losing his family enters a completely unknow world full of demons and dark mysteries.

You only have three things left; your (not so) faithful magic spear, a pact with a mysterious entity, and your daughter Faith.

In a world that has no right choices, only the least bad ones. Will you be able to play with fate to find a happy ending for your daughter?

Our plans involve:

  • Multiple endings;
  • Choices that come back to haunt you;
  • Unique art style;
  • Various monsters that will do anything to take your life;
  • Intriguing mysteries about the darkest part of the universe.

This is our first game - (a group of young and lazy students) - so we are working hard to bring the best experience to you, the player.

Art by: Kisky and @terumailustra

Main theme by: Prod_th

Translation by: Luis Felipe Tonial

History and programming by: me, Siept.
